channel.title: 317 server help
channel.description:
:confused:i am making a 317 server and my port does work and i know that but when i use my server i use ip 127.0.0.1 and it works fine but when i try to play my server on my brothers computer upstair i put in my no.ip address and the port it just says error connecting to server and i dont understand why it wont work is there some way to tell the client to use my ip
when i start it i just click run.bat or whatever it is and start the client is there somthing im not doing and if your wonder the source is stabbingscape v2.2 :D :can anyone teamview if so please pm so we can teamview ;D ;D ;D ;D

@5doomslayer4 wrote:

i have xp but im not sure

item.title: 317 server help
item.dc:creator: @elatechris elatechris
item.description:
@elatechris wrote:

if it says its open its open but… for somereason in certain computers (like mine)
something keeps it blocked no one can connect at all I have widows 7 and if you do 2
then you prolly have the same prob

Read full topic

item.title: 317 server help
item.dc:creator: @5doomslayer4 5doomslayer4
item.description:
@5doomslayer4 wrote:

i got firewall exception also i used the port checker from portforward.com and it says my ports open if its wrong how would i know

Read full topic

item.title: 317 server help
item.dc:creator: @elatechris elatechris
item.description:
@elatechris wrote:

3 things whts ur os?
did you portforward?
and…
did you set the firewall excetptions?

Read full topic

item.title: 317 server help
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

This typically (almost guarentee’d) means that your port is not forwarded properly (if at all). Please, follow one of the many port-forwarding tutorials to get started.

Read full topic
